column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I ordered the spicy chicken ramen with medium spice level and with the thick noodles. I asked for an extra order of noodles and was told it is already put in. Which is strange because at most locations they give it to you on the side
column2: I got charged $2.50 for it and I am not even sure if received any extra noodles because it looked the same as everyone else's bowl. The broth tasted so good and it was perfectly spiced
column3: I ordered some mushrooms and some corn as extras. I was able to finish about half and took the other half home in a nice container. I did not want to be full and it tasted really good the next day after heated up. I ordered a chicken bowl
column4: there was only two slices of chicken in the entire bowl
column5: so I do not really understand that at all.
